mapper.insert: insert into notice (user_id, other_id, board_num, media, flag) values (#{user_id}, #{other_id}, #{board_num}, #{media}, #{flag})
mapper.delete: delete from notice where user_id = #{user_id} and board_num = #{board_num}
mapper.select: select * from notice where other_id = #{user_id} order by date desc limit 30;
